name: Distrubutedsemaphores
tagline: Implementation of a distributed semaphores in java, A sample implementation of how to achieve bug free multi threaded read write synchronization on machines acroos network.
body: This is an implementation for distributed semaphores(A semaphore implementation that is network aware) I did as a college project.It can be used for developing things such as Mirrored Databases,  Implementing auction sites with multiple back-end machines etc.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
